name: Marcus
line: Here, here. It's over now. No bad monsters, magic and fears.

name: Marcus
line: I need to tell you something.

name: Lisa
line: You are a magic girl now!

name: Marcus
line: Yeah. But that doesn't matter. I need to tell you...

name: Marcus
line: I promise, I'll support your hobbies and interests now.

name: Marcus
line: Even if my dreams won't come true...

name: Lisa
line: But you ARE a Magic Girl now! You got that transformation and powers.

name: Lisa
line: So you can do all your saving the world and adventures things!

name: Marcus
line: Can I? I'm not even a girl, I'm a cat.

name: Lisa
line: Why not? If anyone asks, we'll tell you are a neko girl.

name: Marcus
line: ...and you'll tell me about all your hobbies. Ok?
